    "maxLineLength": 80,
    "maxEmptyLines": 2,
    "trailingCommas": true
}
---
module.exports = {         
    colors :[ "red" ,"green" ,"blue" ],
        name :'esfmt',
    doSomething({ name= "Nicholas", sport= "basketball", found=true, lost=false, count=123}){
    // some comment
        return   'I said, "hi!"'
    },
    [ again ] ( ) {
        return "yo"
    },
}




    let name = "Nicholas";
const x = {
    name,
    [ baz ] : "boom",
    *doSomething  () {
        // noop
    },
    async   doSomethingElse( ) {
        await foo()
    }
}

const z = {  };
const zz = {

  };

const zzz = {
// hi
}

const abc = { name: "Nicholas", sport: "basketball", found:true, lost:false, count:123}

if (foo) {
const abc = { name: "Greg", sport: "basketball", found:true, lost:false, count:123}
}

let foom ={bar:1 ,baz :2};

foo({
...DEFAULT_OPTIONS,
...options
});
---
module.exports = {
    colors: ["red", "green", "blue"],
    name: "esfmt",
    doSomething({
        name = "Nicholas",
        sport = "basketball",
        found = true,
        lost = false,
        count = 123,
    }) {
        // some comment
        return "I said, \"hi!\"";
    },
    [again]() {
        return "yo";
    },
};


let name = "Nicholas";
const x = {
    name,
    [baz]: "boom",
    *doSomething() {
        // noop
    },
    async doSomethingElse() {
        await foo();
    },
};

const z = {};
const zz = {};

const zzz = {
    // hi
};

const abc = {
    name: "Nicholas",
    sport: "basketball",
    found: true,
    lost: false,
    count: 123,
};

if (foo) {
    const abc = {
        name: "Greg",
        sport: "basketball",
        found: true,
        lost: false,
        count: 123,
    };
}

let foom = { bar: 1, baz: 2 };

foo({
    ...DEFAULT_OPTIONS,
    ...options,
});
